[i]Alliance[/i] – Whenever another creature you control enters, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
